channel.title: Delta 317 Trade Glitch. Will pay cash for fix
channel.description:
In my Delta based 317 server i have, i just figured out people have been duping. It involves the right click option(s) on the second trade confirmation screen. I would like to know how to remove these options, or fix this. I will pay 20$ on paypal.
You can reach me at Throwing_lawnchairs@yahoo.com on msn
[IMG]http://i147.photobucket.com/albums/r308/killemquick0/dupe.jpg[/img]
Attached to this message is all the coding needed.

item.title: Delta 317 Trade Glitch. Will pay cash for fix
item.dc:creator: @xx_veng_xx xx veng xx
item.description:
@xx_veng_xx wrote:

show a fuckin complete guild not a bullshit…

Read full topic
item.source: Delta 317 Trade Glitch. Will pay cash for fix

item.title: Delta 317 Trade Glitch. Will pay cash for fix
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]This is a FREE site.
We don’t give a shit about you paying for help.

If you want to pay for anything, go buy a server off another forum board.

MoparScape is for learning only.

So, learn, or Gtfo.[/quote]

Im sure you can speak for everyone when you say we, because you are omniscient and all, but i have learned many things since i started this thread. Anyways, your last post had no relevant point, so really its just considered spam, but my message is not considered spam because i am explaining to you how you post is, and once again reminding you if you dont have anything to post that has to do directly with the title of this topic, then please. Gtfo.

EDIT:It must have something to do with this case in clickingmost.java.

case 13218:
client other = c.getClient(c.trade_reqId);
if (!c.validClient(c.trade_reqId))
break;
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastButton < 1000) {
c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
break;
} else {
c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
if (c.inTrade && c.tradeConfirmed && other.tradeConfirmed
&& !c.tradeConfirmed2) {
c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.tradeConfirmed2 = true;
c.actionInterval = 10000;
c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
if (other.tradeConfirmed2) {
c.giveItems();
other.giveItems();
c.savegame(false);
other.savegame(false);
c.sM(“Accepted trade.”);
other.sM(“Accepted trade.”);
break;
}
other.sendQuest(“Other player has accepted.”, 3535);
c.sendQuest(“Waiting for other player…”, 3535);
}
break;

and in client.java

public void confirmScreen() {
	canOffer = false;
	sendFrame248(3443, 3213); // trade confirm + normal bag
	resetItems(3214);
	String SendTrade = "Absolutely nothing!";
	String SendAmount = "";
	int Count = 0;
	client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
	for (GameItem item : offeredItems) {
		if (item.id > 0) {
			if ((item.amount >= 1000) && (item.amount < 1000000)) {
				SendAmount = "@cya@" + (item.amount / 1000) + "K @whi@("
						+ misc.format(item.amount) + ")";
			} else if (item.amount >= 1000000) {
				SendAmount = "@gre@" + (item.amount / 1000000)
						+ " million @whi@(" + misc.format(item.amount)
						+ ")";
			} else {
				SendAmount = "" + misc.format(item.amount);
			}
			if (Count == 0) {
				SendTrade = getItemName(item.id);
			} else {
				SendTrade = SendTrade + "\\n" + getItemName(item.id);
			}
			if (item.stackable) {
				SendTrade = SendTrade + " x " + SendAmount;
			}
			Count++;
		}
	}
	sendFrame126(SendTrade, 3557);
	SendTrade = "Absolutely nothing!";
	SendAmount = "";
	Count = 0;
	for (GameItem item : other.offeredItems) {
		if (item.id > 0) {
			if ((item.amount >= 1000) && (item.amount < 1000000)) {
				SendAmount = "@cya@" + (item.amount / 1000) + "K @whi@("
						+ misc.format(item.amount) + ")";
			} else if (item.amount >= 1000000) {
				SendAmount = "@gre@" + (item.amount / 1000000)
						+ " million @whi@(" + misc.format(item.amount)
						+ ")";
			} else {
				SendAmount = "" + misc.format(item.amount);
			}
			if (Count == 0) {
				SendTrade = getItemName(item.id);
			} else {
				SendTrade = SendTrade + "\\n" + getItemName(item.id);
			}
			if (item.stackable) {
				SendTrade = SendTrade + " x " + SendAmount;
			}
			Count++;
		}
	}
	sendFrame126(SendTrade, 3558);
}

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

See if i knew what to fix, and someone was asking for help i would help them. But someone asking and offering money? I would be even more obliged to help out. You can look through my posts and see that quite a few of my posts are me helping people out. I guess some people really don’t believe in giving a man a fish…Ever. Why can’t you give him a fish, AND teach him to fish.

Anyways that 20$ still stands for anyone who wants to do this for me, or give me the snipits i need. The Coding that is in client.java and clickingmost.java are in a notepad on the first post of this thread. you can reach me at Throwing_lawnchairs@yahoo.com on msn.

item.title: Delta 317 Trade Glitch. Will pay cash for fix
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=killemquick0 link=topic=442972.msg3253804#msg3253804 date=1277953650]

I answered your problem

Please stop spaming this thread. =\

Anyways, Coolhunter, so basically i need to make this for the accept trade?

public void declineTrade() {
	declineTrade(true);
}

public void declineTrade(boolean tellOther) {
	closeInterface();
	client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
	if (tellOther && validClient(trade_reqId)) {
		//other.sM("Other player has declined the trade.");
		other.declineTrade(false);
	}

[/quote]
I’m not spamming.
I’m giving my help.

Also, who is Coolhunter?[/quote]

If you had been reading this thread, you would see that Coonhunter is the only one who has helped me enough to get SOMEWHERE. Unlike you, posting suggestions to get exercise, which i doubt i need. I need FOOD. im 6’2 and 165 pounds. =\ Maybe if i gain another 20 pounds, then i can think about exercise and gaining some muscle mass. but please, don’t post on here unless it has something to do with modifying the coding my of source to remove the trade glitch. thanks.

Read full topic

Anyways, Coonhunter, so basically i need to make this for the accept trade?

public void declineTrade() {
	declineTrade(true);
}

public void declineTrade(boolean tellOther) {
	closeInterface();
	client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
	if (tellOther && validClient(trade_reqId)) {
		//other.sM("Other player has declined the trade.");
		other.declineTrade(false);
	}

item.title: Delta 317 Trade Glitch. Will pay cash for fix
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

CoonHunter:

Is this the glitch about, accepting, then using the right-click option to be able to decline right after? I had a fix for this back when i first started. When they click accept, setup a boolean to be changed to true. Then when they try to decline, it checks if the boolean is set to true or not. If it is, then do nothing. Changing the boolean back to false when a trade is started.

I understand what needs to be done, i just lack the skills to find exactically where and what to put. In clickingmost.java and client.java, i found all the coding, now im trying to make that boolean like you asked, but like i said im not no java pro.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta 317 Trade Glitch. Will pay cash for fix
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

I found it.

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(true, true, xPos + 3, 0xc6b895, “Choose Option”, yPos + 14);
for (int l1 = 0; l1 < anInt1133; l1++) {
int textY = yPos + 31 + (anInt1133 - 1 - l1) * 15;
if(aStringArray1199[l1] == null)
return;
int textColor = 0xc6b895;
if (mouseX > xPos && mouseX < xPos + menuWidth && mouseY > textY - 11 && mouseY < textY + 5) {
if(aStringArray1199[l1].equalsIgnoreCase(“Cancel”))
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(12, textY - 9, xPos + 3, 0x6f695d, menuWidth - 6, 1);
else
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(16, textY - 10, xPos + 3, 0x6f695d, menuWidth - 6, 1);
textColor = 0xeee5c6;
}

However, Even if i remove that in my Webclient, The people who have downloaded the client can still do the glitch. so i need to find how it links to server, and what to remove server side. That 20 bucks still stands. my msn is Throwing_lawnchairs@yahoo.com

Read full topic
item.source: Delta 317 Trade Glitch. Will pay cash for fix

item.title: Delta 317 Trade Glitch. Will pay cash for fix
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=442972.msg3253712#msg3253712 date=1277950013]
Is this the glitch about, accepting, then using the right-click option to be able to decline right after? I had a fix for this back when i first started. When they click accept, setup a boolean to be changed to true. Then when they try to decline, it checks if the boolean is set to true or not. If it is, then do nothing. Changing the boolean back to false when a trade is started.
[/quote]
^Better shot at doing this than the exception^[/quote]

Lol, I might even download delta again, just to re-add it, and make a quick-tut on it. I see it asked alot.

@TOPIC - My idea, only requires editing the trade button case’s in clickingmost.java, and where a trade is opened (client.java for that one). Shouldn’t add any lag if you did it correctly.

Read full topic

[quote=“I Vain I”]Wait, like trade options?
Or like the options tab, next to the music and emotes tab?[/quote]

dupe.jpg772×496

I just saw my spelling fail on click, my bad. but yeah if you right click on accept, click ok then decline, try to retrade them then logout, it dupes them. So i just need to remove those right click options that say “Ok” and “Cancel”

item.source: Delta 317 Trade Glitch. Will pay cash for fix

item.title: Delta 317 Trade Glitch. Will pay cash for fix
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Wait wait wait.

You registered in '06 and only have 10 reputation?
Are you really that lazy to come to these forums, or too incompetent to TRY and learn?

As for the error, add the exception like s p i d a z said.
Also, you had a community of 60k people?
Lots of syis, I see.

As for everyone else:
Delta is not a shitty base.
It has potential, though when it was made Delta knew nothing of the methods nor the right conventions, thus he had ton of shit code, and unhandled packets and cases.

All skills were packed into client.java, but thats the same for any winterLove base.

If someone took the time to clean it out, and add a few handlers around it, it would be almost as stable as hyperion.
That’s the only reason hyperion is better.
It all ready has everything handled.

So, back on topic.
Add the exception.
Problem solved.[/quote]

If i added that exception i don’t think it would fix the problem? The glitch doesn’t happen if someone closes out the trade, it invloves the right click options on the second confirmation screen. You right click accept, Hover over ok, and click ok then click decline. It doesn’t work if you hit accept then decline really fast, its the right click that allows the glitch.

But you know alot more than me about java, so if you want to make 25 bucks and most likely only have to spend 10 min of your time, then let me know.

As for the Syis, if you are talking about Syipkpker crap where you can mass log, It has never happened on my server. How is 60k character files over the course of 4 years hard to believe?

Read full topic
item.source: Delta 317 Trade Glitch. Will pay cash for fix

item.title: Delta 317 Trade Glitch. Will pay cash for fix
item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

Please, i am sure someone knows how to fix this EASY problem. I believe i have scanned over it a dozen times now, checking the trade voids, but i have no idea where just the right click options for the accept and decline buttons on the second trade confirmation screen are. Once again, The faster i get this fixed, the sooner i can bring my server back up. I am offering 20 bucks on paypal. thats some Motivation =D

Oh just a note, i am aware that there are many other 317 bases that are much better than delta, such as hyperion, but really im just a guy who made a 317 back in 06, it became popular and i never erased the character files. I have a community of over 60k, and i have refused to start a new server because of all the people that donated, and still enjoy the server. I am aware that delta is not the greatest base, but comeon it can be good when you have invested as much time as i have in it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @killemquick0 killemquick0
item.description:
@killemquick0 wrote:

jake cake:

It’s called a search bar.

Its called "Wow, i already used the search bar, Looked through my Sprites and Interface folder for the right click option, and searched the source files such as client.java and still no luck.

Basically, all i need to know is how to remove the right click options on the second trade confirmation screen, on the accept and decline buttons. I looked through my Sprites and Interfaces folder for the little interface, couldn’t find it. I also checked the trade method in client.java, idk i just can’t seem to find it.

But really man, keep the spam off my thread please. Lol “use the search button” like im stupid, Comeon man look at my posts and when i joined. im not stupid, don’t you think thats the first thing i did? anyways Mr “Use the search button”, i think YOU should use the search button. here are some of your questions in your Unhelpful collection of posts.

Date Registered:
June 16, 2010, 01:46:36 AM

How do I add a special attack…?

Oh, and how do I make an item 2 handed?

Sorry, I’ve never really edited any of that. - never done anything in autospawn? xD

How do I remove donator from players on this server?

I registered just about 4 years ago.

And this is me.

Date Registered:
July 17, 2006, 08:56:18 AM
